summary.span: 表示图例项中的图例单元。

span.span: Represents a legend cell in a legend item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 图例用图例项填充，它们由 表示。A legend is populated with legend items, which are represented by the . 这些图例项由单独的图例单元组成，它们又由 表示。These legend items consist of individual legend cells, which are in turn represented by the .

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the legend cell.

value.span: 用于绘制图例单元背景的 值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置图例中任何实体的背景色时， 属性具有最高优先级。The property has the highest priority when setting the background color of any entity in the legend.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于绘制图例单元内容的水平单元数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of horizontal cells used to draw the contents of the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示用于绘制图例单元内容的水平单元数。

span.span: An value that represents the number of horizontal cells used to draw the legend cell contents.

value.span: 默认值为 1。

span.span: The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果单元格内容超出了单元格的宽度，则可以将 属性设置为容纳内容所需的单元格数。If the cell contents must extend beyond the cell width, you can set the property to the number of cells required to fit the contents. 如果要向图例添加扩展页眉或标题，最常使用此属性。This property is most often used if you wish to add an extended header or title to the legend. 如果将此属性设置为大于1的值，则必须添加空图例单元，才能容纳扩展图例单元格的内容。When this property is set to a value larger than 1, empty legend cells must be added in order to accommodate the contents of the extended legend cell.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the legend cell type.

value.span: 枚举值，表示用于定义图例单元格内容的类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the type that will be used to define the contents of the legend cell.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定每个图例单元格中将显示的内容的类型。The property determines the type of content that will be displayed in each individual legend cell. 必须指定下列单元类型之一：One of the following cell types must be specified: - Text：使用 属性指定一个字符串，该字符串将显示在图例单元中。Text: A string is specified using the property, and will be displayed in the legend cell. - SeriesSymbol：系列符号由 类中的 属性定义。SeriesSymbol: A series symbol is defined by the property in the class. 它将为图例单元显示。It will be displayed for the legend cell. 请记住，序列符号是一个可视指示器，即线条、矩形或标记。Recall that a series symbol is a visual indicator - a line, rectangle or marker. 如果 设置为 ，则自定义项的所有标记特性都将应用于该单元格。When is set to , all marker attributes of the custom item apply to the cell. - 图像：使用 属性定义图像，并将其显示在图例单元中。Image: An image is defined using the property and will be displayed in the legend cell.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元的字体。

span.span: Gets or sets the font for the legend cell.

value.span: 获取一个 对象，表示图例单元的字体。

span.span: A object that represents the font for the legend cell.

value.span: 默认值为“Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt”。

span.span: The default value is "Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于设置图例单元的字体属性。The property can be used to set font properties of the legend cell. 如果尝试在运行时更改此 对象的属性，则会发生编译错误。If you attempt to change the properties of this object at run time, a compilation error will occur. 若要在运行时设置字体属性，必须创建一个新的 对象。To set font properties at run time, you must create a new object.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元格的映射区特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the map area attributes of the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 值，表示图例单元格相应映射区的特性。

span.span: A value that represents the attributes of the legend cell's corresponding map area.

value.span: 默认值为零长度的字符串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置了 属性，则会自动创建客户端图像映射。If you set the property, a client-side image map will automatically be created. 还将创建一个映射区，并将其属性字符串追加到 "\<映射" > 标记，该标记对应于相关的图例单元。A map area will also be created, with its attribute string appended to the \ tag that corresponds to the relevant legend cell. 属性可以与 属性结合使用，以指定映射区特性（例如 target = _blank）以及客户端事件处理程序，例如 OnClick = "MyEvent （）"。The property can be used in conjunction with the property to specify map area attributes, for example, target= _blank, as well as client-side event handlers, for example, OnClick="MyEvent()". 如果 属性设置为 `false`，则设置此属性将不起作用。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. 如果为序列和该序列的数据点设置了 属性，则数据点属性优先。If the property is set for both a series and a data point of that series, the data point property has precedence. 设置此属性时，可以使用特殊关键字，每个关键字都将替换为适用的图表元素中的某些类型的数据。Special keywords may be used when setting this property, and each keyword will be replaced with some type of data from the applicable chart element.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元的边距。

span.span: Gets or sets the margins of the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示图例单元格边距的顶部、底部、左侧和右侧值。

span.span: A object that represents the top, bottom, left, and right values of the legend cell margins.

value.span: 顶部、底部、左侧和右侧的默认值为“0,0,15,15”。

span.span: The default values for top, bottom, left and right are "0,0,15,15".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 边距以图例单元格字号的百分比度量。Margins are measured as a percentage of the font size for the legend cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 属性设置为 时， 属性才适用。The property is only applicable if the property is set to .

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip text for the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例单元的工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip for the legend cell.

value.span: 默认值为零长度的字符串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为 `false`，则设置此属性将不起作用。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要以这种方式创建图像映射，则必须将 对象的 属性设置为 ""。To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 使用二进制流式处理时，可以创建图像映射，但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 如果为图例项和图例单元设置 `ToolTip` 属性，则图例单元属性优先。If the `ToolTip` property is set for both a legend item and a legend cell, the legend cell property has precedence. 此 属性允许您设置特殊关键字，以显示不同类型的图表相关数据。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 若要创建具有用户定义坐标的图像映射，请使用根 对象的 属性。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元格的 URL 目标。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL target of the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图表元素的目标 URL 或定位点。

span.span: A value that represents the destination URL or anchor point of the chart element.

value.span: 若要使用绝对 URL，请以“http://”或“www.”开始字符串表达式。

span.span: To use an absolute URL, start the string expression with either "http://" or "www.".

value.span: 如果字符串不是以上述前缀之一开始，则将该字符串视为一个相对 URL。

span.span: If the string does not start with either of these prefixes it will be treated as a relative URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置此属性，则将自动创建客户端图像映射。If you set this property, a client-side image map will be automatically created. 还将创建一个映射区，并将其 Href 特性设置为指定的定位点或 URL。A map area will also be created with its Href attribute set to the specified anchor or URL. 如果 属性设置为 `false`，则设置此属性将不起作用。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. 可以通过使用 属性指定地图区域的属性，例如 target = _blank。Attributes of the map area(s), for example, target=_blank, can be specified by using the property. 属性允许您设置特殊关键字，以显示不同类型的图表相关数据。The property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 有关更多信息，请参见[关键字](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8a19d422-4eee-45ff-a5c3-feff7b76fa8c)。For more information, see [Keywords](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8a19d422-4eee-45ff-a5c3-feff7b76fa8c). 若要创建具有用户定义坐标的图像映射，请使用根 对象的 属性。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object. 有关更多信息，请参见[图表图像呈现](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505)。For more information, see [Chart Image Rendering](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505).
